text: Razve oni ne videli, kak My prolivayem dozhd' na issokhshuyu zemlyu i po Nashemu poveleniyu tekut po ney reki, rastut posevy, kotorymi pitayetsya ikh skot, i zorna i plody, kotorymi oni sami pitayutsya? Neuzheli oni oslepli i ne vidyat znameniy mogushchestva Allakha, kotoryy mozhet ozhivit' mortvykh
